attributes.action: Stop the UK’s Rwanda plan for asylum seekers.
attributes.additional_details: It is simply a further example of the Prime Minister trying to distract from his law breaking and misleading of Parliament as well as being cruel and out of keeping with British values of decency and fair play
attributes.background: Cancel this inhuman and morally indefensible policy

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
